amendment.description: Amendment prevents the closure of a credit card account in response to the imposition of a new fee from negatively impacting a consumer's credit report or credit score.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-326 to prevent the closure of a credit card account in response to the imposition of a new fee from negatively impacting a consumer's credit report or credit score.
